body: I think it would be nicer to make blocks own their node lists. Right now, when you delete a block, you have to remember to iterate over all nodes inside, or they will start to accumulate as dangling nodes that aren't in the node list anywhere
body_html: I think it would be nicer to make blocks own their node lists. Right now, when you delete a block, you have to remember to iterate over all nodes inside, or they will start to accumulate as dangling nodes that aren't in the node list anywhere
